column5: Found this little guy swimming off the dock and scooped him up in the minnow net.
a year or two and he could nip yer finger right off

that is incredibly small!  nice find....I wonder if a fish would take a shot at him....they go for crayfish the same size or bigger... Whoops!  Not that I'm implying using him for bait!  Just wondering if he'd get preyed upon.
that is not a common snapping turtle hatchling, but a rarely seen map turtle. this is the second time this year someone posted a map... perhaps they are making a comeback!
